nodes.text: During the Imperial Era, the planet Thisspias and homeworld of the Thisspiasian warrior race, was occupied and oppressed by the Galactic Empire. The occupation started in order to oppress Galactic Republic support, but due to Thisspiasian resistance the Imperials initiated orbital bombardments of the planet surface. The Thisspiasians continued to offer resistance and the Imperial governor decided to remove the Blood Monarch.
